content.question: A person is running on a track. Which of the following forces propels the runner forward?

choices.label: The normal force exerted by the ground on the person
The normal force exerted by the person on the ground
The force of friction exerted by the ground on the person
The force of friction exerted by the person on the ground

content.answer: The force of friction exerted by the ground on the person

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
